Class I2CDevice

java.lang.Object
  I2CDevice
Direct Known Subclasses:
Motor, Thermopile
public class I2CDevice
extends java.lang.Object

I2CDevice.java - A skeleton I2C driver..

Revision History:

  • March 14, 2008, Benjamin Gauronskas
    • Rewrote command to send bool on success.
    • Fixed problem with read method.
    • Overloaded command to accept a sleep parameter.
  • March 13, 2008, Benjamin Gauronskas
    • Added method for reading bytes.
    • Wrote; did not even test.
    • Created comments.

Constructor Detail

I2CDevice

public I2CDevice(I2CChannel channel,
                 byte address)
Constructor. It constructs an I2CDevice object using an already built I2CChannel and the I2C address of the device

Parameters:
channel - The i2cchannel to use.
address - The address of the device on the i2c channel.
Method Detail

command

public boolean command(byte register,
                       byte cmd)
sends a command to a device. It will basically run the command on the I2CChannel member variable. Refer to its man page for more details. If we want this multi-threaded, this is probably the place to do it. This is an overloaded default no sleeping method.

Parameters:
register - The register receiving the command.
cmd - The command that will be executed.
Returns:
Whether the command completed successfully.

command

public boolean command(byte register,
                       byte cmd,
                       int sleep)
sends a command to a device. It will basically run the command on the I2CChannel member variable. Refer to its man page for more details. If we want this multi-threaded, this is probably the place to do it. This is an overloaded default no sleeping method.

Parameters:
register - The register receiving the command.
cmd - The command that will be executed.
sleep - how long to sleep after completing the command.
Returns:
Whether the command completed successfully.

readLong

public long readLong(byte register)
Reads a long from a device. It simply asks for a long

Parameters:
register - The register receiving the command.
Returns:
The long that was taken off the inbound buffer.

readByte

public byte readByte(byte register)
Reads a byte from a device. It simply asks for a byte

Parameters:
register - The register receiving the command.
Returns:
The long that was taken off the inbound buffer.
